movie.title: Penguin Rescue
movie.description_intro: Intergalactic space explorers travel to Earth where they meet a penguin and learn all about the Arctic.
movie.description_full: Intergalactic space explorers travel to Earth where they meet a penguin and learn all about the Arctic.

movies.title: Real
movies.summary: A criminal aspiring to build a casino finds himself in endless threat when a man starts imitating every single thing he does.
movies.description_full: A criminal aspiring to build a casino finds himself in endless threat when a man starts imitating every single thing he does.
movies.synopsis: A criminal aspiring to build a casino finds himself in endless threat when a man starts imitating every single thing he does.

movies.title: Lionheart
movies.summary: Lyon Gaultier is a deserter in the Foreign Legion arriving in the USA entirely hard up. He finds his brother between life and death and his sister-in-law without the money needed to heal her husband and to maintain her child. To earn the money needed, Gaultier decides to take part in some very dangerous clandestine fights.
movies.description_full: Lyon Gaultier is a deserter in the Foreign Legion arriving in the USA entirely hard up. He finds his brother between life and death and his sister-in-law without the money needed to heal her husband and to maintain her child. To earn the money needed, Gaultier decides to take part in some very dangerous clandestine fights.

movies.title: 50 First Dates
movies.summary: Henry Roth lives in a Hawaiian paradise with the company of endless women with no strings attached. This is until he meets Lucy Whitmore. Both Henry and Lucy enjoy the company of each other and feel the start of a serious relationship occurring. Approaching Lucy the next day, Henry is confused when Lucy fails to recognize him. This is the moment Henry discovers that Lucy actually suffers from short term memory loss and can't remember each individual day. Henry won't let this stop him and is prepared to make her fall in love with him all over again, each and every day.

movies.title: The Forbidden Dance
movies.summary: A princess in the Amazon rain forest tries to fight a conglomerate threatening the forests by going to Los Angeles. There she links up with a rich kid who tells her that she must get on TV to succeed with her mission. The two come up with the idea of winning a lambada dance contest that is getting TV attention.
